meaningMnemonic: Everything that happened <kanji>since</kanji> you <kanji>descend</kanji>ed some stairs, is <vocabulary>hereafter</vocabulary>. It's all <vocabulary>after</vocabulary> the stairs thing you did, <vocabulary>since</vocabulary> you did it already.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
